VXLIB Function Reference

Accumulate Weighted

OpenVX Function Description

  • Accumulates a weighted value from an input image to an output image.

OpenVX Function Reference Page

  • https://www.khronos.org/registry/vx/specs/1.1/html/d2/d2e/group__group__vision__function__accumulate__weighted.html

VXLIB API

  • VXLIB_accumulateWeightedImage_i8u_io8u : Input and output images are U8 format
    • Calls internally: VXLIB_addWeight_i8u_i8u_o8u
